Package org.apache.james.smtpserver.core.filter.fastfail

Class Summary
AbstractJunkHandler  
DNSRBLHandler Connect handler for DNSRBL processing
GreylistHandler GreylistHandler which can be used to activate Greylisting
JunkHandlerData  
JunkScoreHandler Check if a configured JunkScore is reached and perform an action.
MaxRcptHandler  
ResolvableEhloHeloHandler This CommandHandler can be used to reject not resolvable EHLO/HELO
ReverseEqualsEhloHeloHandler  
SpamAssassinHandler This MessageHandler could be used to check message against spamd before accept the email.
SPFHandler SPFHandler which could be used to reject mail based on spf.
SupressDuplicateRcptHandler This handler can be used to just ignore duplicated recipients.
TarpitHandler  
URIRBLHandler Extract domains from message and check against URIRBLServer.
ValidRcptHandler Handler which reject invalid recipients
ValidRcptMX This class can be used to reject email with bogus MX which is send from a authorized user or an authorized network.
ValidSenderDomainHandler
